#summary A set of functions for CameraControlSystem plane binded camera.

=== Overview ===
A plane binded camera is constrained to the limits of a plane. The camera always points to the target, perpendicularly 

to the plane. 
<BR>
<BR>
<BR>
=== !SetPlaneBindedCameraTightness(real camera_id, real tightness) ===
----
Sets the tightness of the camera.
====Parameters====
   * _camera_id_ - The ID of the camera control system camera object.
   * _tightness_ - The camera tightness.
